item.title: CVE-2023-2082|2023-07-14T04:38:53.836Z -- buymeacoffee -- buy%20me%20a%20coffee%20%E2%80%93%20button%20and%20widget%20plugin
item.description: The "Buy Me a Coffee â€“ Button and Widget Plugin" plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting in versions up to, and including, 3.6 due to insufficient sanitization and escaping on the 'text value set via the bmc_post_reception action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions, and above to inject arbitrary web scripts into pages that execute whenever a victim accesses a page with the injected scripts.
